item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Panagiotis Englezos, a full-stack & Android developer based in Greece ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡·. A passionate and dedicated full-stack developer with years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying high quality dynamic and responsive web applications. My expertise spans both front-end and back-end development, allowing me to create comprehensive solutions that meet diverse business needs. Experienced with the Android Open Source Project (AOSP), I have contributed to various Android custom ROM projects such as LineageOS and ArrowOS.
